Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Unitron/Serpentor/Sixshot/Nemesis Enforcer:



Anubis activated his feet boosters, escaping autogun fire, though the 
powerful "lightning bolt" dug into his left shin.  Gaining altitude, he fired 
three plasma bolts down at Rhinox, autogun fire piercing his feet, sending 
him crashing down into a clearing with high grass.

---

Hades, took out a grenade, throwing it at the autoguns, turning his head as 
it blew up when getting into the middle of them, an optic blast lancing out 
at Snow Tech.

---

Unitron laughed, quickly flipping to the left, evading the darts.  "Try a 
faster weapon, like a laser!" he yelled, raising both of his laser rifles.  
Firing four laser bolts from one rifle at Shadow Cat, and four at Rhinox as 
he ran.

---

Serpentor laughed at Rhinox.  "Run, run as fast as you can, you won't catch 
me, I'm the Void-Man!" he smiled, firing a powerful blast from his plasma 
launcher at an area 10 ft in front of Rhinox as the Maximal ran towards it.  

---

Sixshot raised his main cannon, firing a powerful sonic blast at mid-hull of 
the Ark, two missile launchers firing a total of four rockets at the Ark.

---

Koga Shuko fired two optic blasts at Liono Prime's left knee, raising his 
missile launcher at the same time, firing a rocket off at Rhinox (using his 
internal sensors to pinpoint the Maximal's position).

---

Nemesis Enforcer saw Rhinox being chased like mad.  Looking around, he 
smiled.  The poifect crime.  Raising his rifle, he fired ten rapid laser 
bolts off at the Maximal's pelvis.
